Isabella Rodriguez.description: conversing about conversing about joining a potluck lunch at the cafe, with Maria offering to bring a dish and Isabella inviting her to help with set-up @ <persona> Maria Lopez
chat: Isabella Rodriguez
Hi Maria! I see you're studying hard. How's the reading going?
Maria Lopez
Hi Isabella! Yes, I'm trying to stay on top of my readings. It's going well so far. How have you been?
Isabella Rodriguez
I've been keeping busy with the cafe as usual. We have a potluck lunch today, are you planning on joining?
Maria Lopez
That sounds like fun! I would love to join the potluck lunch. What should I bring?
Isabella Rodriguez
Great! Just bring your favorite dish to share with everyone. Looking forward to having you there!
Maria Lopez
Thank you, Isabella! I'll make sure to bring something delicious for the potluck lunch. Looking forward to it!
Isabella Rodriguez
Perfect! I'll see you at 12 pm for the potluck lunch then. Let me know if you need any help with the recipe.
Maria Lopez
Thank you, Isabella! I appreciate the invitation. I'll start thinking about what dish to bring for the potluck lunch.
Isabella Rodriguez
Feel free to stop by the cafe early to help set up for the potluck lunch if you'd like!
Maria Lopez
Sounds good, Isabella! I'll definitely stop by early to help with the set-up. Thank you for the offer!
Isabella Rodriguez
I'll see you later, Maria! Have a great time studying and see you at the potluck lunch!

Klaus Mueller.description: working on his research paper on gentrification (outlining the structure of his research paper) @ the Ville:Dorm for Oak Hill College:Klaus Mueller's room:desk
